mapper.delete: delete from cart_tb where p_num=#{param1} and m_num=#{param2}
mapper.update: update cart_tb set ca_amount=#{param3} where p_num=#{param2} and m_num=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into payment_cart_tb values(#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, (select ca_sysdate from cart_tb where m_num=#{param1} and p_num=#{param2}))
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num and a.ci_end_day>sysdate and a.ci_use_day is null order by a.ci_num asc) mcou) order by rownum asc

select * from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, a.ci_use_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num order by a.ci_num asc) mcou) where ci_end_day<sysdate or ci_use_day is not null order by rownum asc
